import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Link as ScrollLink}from"react-scroll";import{Button}from"./Button";import'./Navbar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navbar(){// State to manage the mobile menu click and button visibility

const showButton=()=>{if(window.innerWidth<=960){setButton(false);}else{setButton(true);}};// Effect to set up event listener for window resize
